title: How can I unlock my phone from FRP? as I've accidentally activated it when I lost my phone
content:
When I was traveling I lost my phone on the airport and send the command to erase all, after that I found my phone and used it with a sim card in Brasil which is the country I was traveling, once I get back to Chile my hometown, I can make my phone to have connection with any mobile network, so I'm suspecting is a FRP block.

I tried the following:
factory restored my phone
removed from my Google Account my current phone
tried to connect to another Google Account

Nothing seems to be working, how can I have my phone back to normality? I have access to my google accounts on which the phone was previously connected.
